game.name: Lite 3
game.history: The game of Lite 3 was created by Tiger Games.
game.pieces: Each player is assigned a red or green piece.
game.towin: Be the first player to get three of your pieces in a row either horizontally, vertically or diagonally.
game.rules: Lite 3 is a game very similar to Tic Tac Toe. The game is for two players. The only rule added to this game is that when a player has four of the squares selected on the board, the first square that the player selected becomes neutral again.[img src="lite3a.jpg" alt="lite 3 board" width="200"] [img src="lite3b.jpg" alt="lite 3 board" width="200"]

strategy.name: Memory
strategy.description: Try to remember the order of the pieces placed because a button may shut off even if you think you have a winning move.

variant.name: Misere
variant.description: Force your opponent to connect three of his pieces in a row either horizontally, vertically or diagonally.

variant.name: Novice/Expert
variant.description: The actual game supports a novice/expert mode. In the novice mode, there is no time limit. In the expert mode, the computer plays at its smartest and there is a time limit.
